Post.title: maven
Post._content:
# 

mavenmaven


# maven

## jar  

<!--more-->

mavenmavenjar`mvn install`mavenpom.xml

sqljdbc4.jarmaven

```
D:\soft\develop\java-jars>mvn install:install-file -Dfile=sqljdbc4.jar -DgroupId=com.microsoft.sqlserver -DartifactId=sqljdbc4 -Dversion=4.0 -Dpackaging=jar
[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[INFO]
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Building Maven Stub Project (No POM) 1
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO]
[INFO] --- maven-install-plugin:2.3.1:install-file (default-cli) @ standalone-pom ---
[INFO] Installing D:\soft\develop\java-jars\sqljdbc4.jar to C:\Users\yuanjinan\.m2\repository\com\microsoft\sqlserver\sqljdbc4\4.0\sqljdbc4-4.0.jar
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD SUCCESS
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time: 0.427s
[INFO] Finished at: Sat Jun 25 13:32:34 CST 2016
[INFO] Final Memory: 5M/119M
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
```
pom.xml

```xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.microsoft.sqlserver</groupId>
  <artifactId>sqljdbc4</artifactId>
  <version>4.0</version>
</dependency>
```
jarmaven
Post.raw:
---
title: maven
date: 2016-06-25 11:41:41
tags: [maven,,maven]
---


# 

mavenmaven


# maven

## jar  

<!--more-->

mavenmavenjar`mvn install`mavenpom.xml

sqljdbc4.jarmaven

```
D:\soft\develop\java-jars>mvn install:install-file -Dfile=sqljdbc4.jar -DgroupId=com.microsoft.sqlserver -DartifactId=sqljdbc4 -Dversion=4.0 -Dpackaging=jar
[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[INFO]
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Building Maven Stub Project (No POM) 1
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO]
[INFO] --- maven-install-plugin:2.3.1:install-file (default-cli) @ standalone-pom ---
[INFO] Installing D:\soft\develop\java-jars\sqljdbc4.jar to C:\Users\yuanjinan\.m2\repository\com\microsoft\sqlserver\sqljdbc4\4.0\sqljdbc4-4.0.jar
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD SUCCESS
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time: 0.427s
[INFO] Finished at: Sat Jun 25 13:32:34 CST 2016
[INFO] Final Memory: 5M/119M
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
```
pom.xml

```xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.microsoft.sqlserver</groupId>
  <artifactId>sqljdbc4</artifactId>
  <version>4.0</version>
</dependency>
```
jarmaven
Post.more:
在maven仓库找不到引用的包，同时还要使用maven来管理，此时我们就需要先去其他官网找到我们自己要用的jar包，然后使用mvn install将其放到我们的本地的maven仓库，之后后在项目pom.xml里面添加此依赖包就可以

比如引用sqljdbc4.jar包，maven仓库中没有，所以我们先从微软官网下载下来，然后使用下面的命令将期添加到自己的本地仓库中去

D:\soft\develop\java-jars>mvn install:install-file -Dfile=sqljdbc4.jar -DgroupId=com.microsoft.sqlserver -DartifactId=sqljdbc4 -Dversion=4.0 -Dpackaging=jar
[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[INFO]
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Building Maven Stub Project (No POM) 1
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO]
[INFO] --- maven-install-plugin:2.3.1:install-file (default-cli) @ standalone-pom ---
[INFO] Installing D:\soft\develop\java-jars\sqljdbc4.jar to C:\Users\yuanjinan\.m2\repository\com\microsoft\sqlserver\sqljdbc4\4.0\sqljdbc4-4.0.jar
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD SUCCESS
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time: 0.427s
[INFO] Finished at: Sat Jun 25 13:32:34 CST 2016
[INFO] Final Memory: 5M/119M
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------

接着在pom.xml添加依赖

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.microsoft.sqlserver</groupId>
  <artifactId>sqljdbc4</artifactId>
  <version>4.0</version>
</dependency>

此方法也可以方便把我们自己的项目的jar包安装到本地的maven仓库中去

Post.title: markdown
Post._content:
# Cmd Markdown Cmd-Markdown --- ### 1. * ** ** **** ### 2. === --- ``` ============================ -------------------------------------------------- ### ``` (H1-H6)# H1, ## H2, ### H3#### H4 ### 3. \[]() [](http://ghosertblog.github.com) ### 4. *+- - - - ### 5. 1. 2. 3. ### 6. > > ### 7. \`` `html` ### 8. ### 9. \!\[]() ![](https://www.zybuluo.com/static/img/my_head.jpg) # Cmd Markdown ### 1. `[TOC]` [TOC] ### 2. Markdown Tags Markdown ### 3. ~~ ~~~~ ### 4. [^keyword] [^footnote] [^footnote2] ### 5. LaTeX $ $E=mc^2$ $$ $$\sum_{i=1}^n a_i=0$$ $$f(x_1,x_x,\ldots,x_n) = x_1^2 + x_2^2 + \cdots + x_n^2 $$ $$\sum^{j-1}_{k=0}{\widehat{\gamma}_{kj} z_k}$$ [MathJax](http://meta.math.stackexchange.com/questions/5020/mathjax-basic-tutorial-and-quick-reference) ### 6. ``` $ sudo apt-get install vim-gnome ``` Python ```python @requires_authorization def somefunc(param1='', param2=0): '''A docstring''' if param1 > param2: # interesting print 'Greater' return (param2 - param1 + 1) or None class SomeClass: pass >>> message = '''interpreter ... prompt''' ``` JavaScript ``` javascript /** * nth element in the fibonacci series. * @param n >= 0 * @return the nth element, >= 0. */ function fib(n) { var a = 1, b = 1; var tmp; while (--n >= 0) { tmp = a; a += b; b = tmp; } return a; } document.write(fib(10)); ``` ### 7. #### ```flow st=>start: Start:>https://www.zybuluo.com io=>inputoutput: verification op=>operation: Your Operation cond=>condition: Yes or No? sub=>subroutine: Your Subroutine e=>end st->io->op->cond cond(yes)->e cond(no)->sub->io ``` #### [](http://adrai.github.io/flowchart.js/) ### 8. #### 1 ```seq Alice->Bob: Hello Bob, how are you? Note right of Bob: Bob thinks Bob-->Alice: I am good thanks! ``` #### 2 ```seq Title: Here is a title A->B: Normal line B-->C: Dashed line C->>D: Open arrow D-->>A: Dashed open arrow ``` #### [](http://bramp.github.io/js-sequence-diagrams/) ### 9. | | | | | -------- | -----: | :----: | | | \$1600 | 5 | | | \$12 | 12 | | | \$1 | 234 | ### 10. 1 : 1 2 : ### 11. Html Markdown Html Html
### 12. `i ` `icon-weibo` [font-awesome](http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/3.2.1/icons/) ### 13. Todo [ ] [x] Markdown - [ ] **Cmd Markdown ** - [ ] Cmd - [ ] PDF - [x] Todo [](https://github.com/blog/1375-task-lists-in-gfm-issues-pulls-comments) - [x] LaTex - [x] LaTex - [x] LaTex [](http://docs.mathjax.org/en/latest/tex.html#tex-eq-numbers) - [ ] **** - [ ] - [ ] - [x] Todo - [ ] **Cmd Markdown ** - [ ] Cmd - [ ] PDF - [x] Todo [](https://github.com/blog/1375-task-lists-in-gfm-issues-pulls-comments) - [x] LaTex - [x] LaTex - [x] LaTex [](http://docs.mathjax.org/en/latest/tex.html#tex-eq-numbers) - [ ] **** - [ ] - [ ] - [x] [^footnote]: ** **** [^footnote2]: ** ****

Post.title: suibi
Post._content:
<!--more-->

## prettify

```java
@Test
public  void   test3() throws ParseException {
    SqlSession session = sqlSessionFactory.openSession();
    try {
        IUserDao userDao = session.getMapper(IUserDao.class);
        User user=new User(0,"","zhaoliu",1,new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd").parse("1989-01-23"));
        int acceptCount= userDao.insert(user);
        session.commit();
        Assert.assertEquals(1,acceptCount);
    } finally {
        session.close();
    }
}
```
Post.content:
测试prettify高亮

@Test
public  void   test3() throws ParseException {
    SqlSession session = sqlSessionFactory.openSession();
    try {
        IUserDao userDao = session.getMapper(IUserDao.class);
        User user=new User(0,"赵六","zhaoliu",1,new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd").parse("1989-01-23"));
        int acceptCount= userDao.insert(user);
        session.commit();
        Assert.assertEquals(1,acceptCount);
    } finally {
        session.close();
    }
}
Post.more:
测试prettify高亮

@Test
public  void   test3() throws ParseException {
    SqlSession session = sqlSessionFactory.openSession();
    try {
        IUserDao userDao = session.getMapper(IUserDao.class);
        User user=new User(0,"赵六","zhaoliu",1,new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd").parse("1989-01-23"));
        int acceptCount= userDao.insert(user);
        session.commit();
        Assert.assertEquals(1,acceptCount);
    } finally {
        session.close();
    }
}

Post.title: hexo yiliaprettify
Post._content:
hexoprettify


## 

_config.ymlhighlight
```
highlight:
  enable: false
  line_number: false
  auto_detect: false
  tab_replace:
```
<!--more-->
## prettify

### ****

github[prettify](https://github.com/google/code-prettify)src(prettify)hexosourcesource(plugins)source/plugins,**sourcepublic**
![](http://ww2.sinaimg.cn/large/7462786bgw1f5h1gmp2m7j20k709bmzm.jpg)

hexo_config.yml
```
skip_render:
    - "plugins/**"
```
hexopluginsprettifyjshexo

### ****

yilia`yilia\layout\_partial\head.ejs``yilia\layout\_partial\after-footer.ejs`

head.ejs

```js
............
<!--prettifycss-->
<link href="/plugins/prettify/prettify.css" rel="stylesheet">
............
```

after-footer.ejs
```js
............
<!--prettify-->
<script src="/plugins/prettify/prettify.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
$(window).load(function(){
$('pre').addClass('prettyprint linenums').attr('style', 'overflow:auto;');
 prettyPrint();
})
</script>
............
```
**jquery**

****

`hexo clean && hexo g && hexo server` :

      word-break: break-all;

## 

prettify
1. prettify
2. 


### 

1. hexo_config.yml,
    ```
    #prettify 
    # enable 
    # theme prettify
    prettify:
      enable: true
      theme: "themes.css"
    ```

2. _config.yml,
    ```
    #highlight
    highlight:
      enable: false
    ```
3. prettify`source/plugins/`

   ![](http://ww2.sinaimg.cn/large/7462786bgw1f5ia1mb52vj20bm01ka9y.jpg)

###  
1.  themes\yilia\source\css\_variables.styl 
   ```
    highlight = hexo-config("highlight.enable")
   ```
2. themes\yilia\source\css\style.styl
    ```
    if highlight{
     @import "_partial/highlight"
    }
    ```
3. `yilia\layout\_partial\head.ejs``yilia\layout\_partial\after-footer.ejs`

   head.ejs
   ```
   <% if (config.prettify.enable){ %>
     <!--prettifycss-->
     <link href="/plugins/prettify/themes/<%= config.prettify.theme %>.css" rel="stylesheet">
   <% } %>
   ```
   after-footer.ejs
   ```
   <!--prettifyjs-->
   <% if (config.prettify.enable){ %>
   <script src="/plugins/prettify/prettify.js"></script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
   $(window).load(function(){
   $('pre').addClass('prettyprint linenums').attr('style', 'overflow:auto;');
    prettyPrint();
   })
   </script>
   <%}%>
   ```
   prettify/plugins/prettify/themes/prettify.css
   /plugins/prettify/themes/

prettify
1. prettify
2. 


### 

1. hexo_config.yml,
    ```
    #prettify 
    # enable 
    # theme prettify
    prettify:
      enable: true
      theme: "themes.css"
    ```

2. _config.yml,
    ```
    #highlight
    highlight:
      enable: false
    ```
3. prettify`source/plugins/`

   ![](http://ww2.sinaimg.cn/large/7462786bgw1f5ia1mb52vj20bm01ka9y.jpg)

###  
1.  themes\yilia\source\css\_variables.styl 
   ```
    highlight = hexo-config("highlight.enable")
   ```
2. themes\yilia\source\css\style.styl
    ```
    if highlight{
     @import "_partial/highlight"
    }
    ```
3. `yilia\layout\_partial\head.ejs``yilia\layout\_partial\after-footer.ejs`

   head.ejs
   ```
   <% if (config.prettify.enable){ %>
     <!--prettifycss-->
     <link href="/plugins/prettify/themes/<%= config.prettify.theme %>.css" rel="stylesheet">
   <% } %>
   ```
   after-footer.ejs
   ```
   <!--prettifyjs-->
   <% if (config.prettify.enable){ %>
   <script src="/plugins/prettify/prettify.js"></script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
   $(window).load(function(){
   $('pre').addClass('prettyprint linenums').attr('style', 'overflow:auto;');
    prettyPrint();
   })
   </script>
   <%}%>
   ```
   prettify/plugins/prettify/themes/prettify.css
   /plugins/prettify/themes/
